title: Epic and Stories Input Format
description: JSON format for creating epics and stories. Convert your text format to this JSON structure.

epicId.description: 2-6 character uppercase acronym for the epic (e.g., 'RCM', 'SCHED', 'AI'). Used in story IDs like F-XXX-001

title.description: Full epic title (e.g., 'Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) & Financial Analytics')

summary.description: Short summary of the epic (first sentence from Business Overview)

businessOverview.description: Full Business Overview text. This becomes the epic description.

technicalArchitecture.description: Optional: Technical Architecture Components section (markdown format)

caseStudyReference.description: Optional: Case Study Reference section (markdown format)

category.description: Category/heading for the story (e.g., 'Automated Claim Management', 'Performance'). Used as a tag and to prefix the summary.

summary.description: Optional: Story summary. If not provided, will be auto-generated as '{category}: {title}'
